creator: Arkadium Games
descriptionHtml:
Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is a new, beautiful version of the classic bubble shooter formula.

Aim, shoot, and pop bubbles in this cathartic action game. Arkadium's Bubble Shooter offers numerous levels and bubble powerups to keep you playing endless free bubble shooter games.

This free Bubble Shooter game is also known as Bubble Pop, Bubble Shooter Arena, Puzzle Bobble, or Bust a Move around the world. Whether you're a beginner or a professional, Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fans of all ages love this modern, relaxing Bubble Shooter game!

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter delivers:
🟠 Gorgeous art, sound, and bubble popping animations
🟠 Lightning, bomb and ice bubbles for more fun and strategic play
🟠 Precise bubble shooting action
🟠 Countless levels for hours of bubble shooter fun
🟠 Wall bounce shots for difficult to reach bubbles

Fun facts about Bubble Shooter games:
🟢 The first bubble shooter game was released in 1994
🟢 Bubble shooter has been remade thousands of times, but this is the best version
🟢 Most bubble shooter games do not have powerup bubbles
🟢 The original bubble shooter game, Puzzle Bobble, was released as Bust a Move in the United States

How to play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter:
Bubble Shooter is perfect for new and experienced players alike. To play, simply use your finger to aim the bubble and shoot it at two or more bubbles of the same color to pop them! The goal of the game is to remove all bubbles on the board, but remember that you can drop bubbles by popping the bubbles above them; this is key to winning Arkadium's Bubble Shooter. As you play, you will also unlock powerup bubbles that allow you to clear bubbles more quickly. Don't forget to bounce bubbles off walls to hit more strategic shots!

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is the best version of bubble shooter on Android. Play now to unwind and pop your stress away with relaxing bubble shooter games.

Play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter online: https://www.arkadium.com/games/bubble-shooter/

descriptionHtml:
Play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter today and enjoy as many free bubble games as you like! Install Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter app and watch the bubble pop.

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is the classic bubble shooter game you know and love. Match 3 bubbles of the same color and launch yourself into a balloon crushing mania. It may burst bubbles but this is one of the best color match bubble games of all time.

Play this free popular casual puzzle game anytime, anywhere. With Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter, you can even play offline with no wifi needed!

Aim, shoot, and pop bubbles in this cathartic action game. Arkadium's Bubble Shooter offers numerous levels and bubble powerups to keep you playing endless free bubble shooter games.

This free Bubble Shooter game is also known as Bubble Pop, Bubble Shooter Arena, Puzzle Bobble, or Bust a Move around the world. Whether you're a beginner or a professional, Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fans of all ages love this modern, relaxing Bubble Shooter game!

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter delivers:
🟠 Gorgeous art, sound, and bubble popping animations
🟠 Lightning bubbles for clean bubble pop action – burst bubbles by the dozen with this powerup
🟠 Bomb bubbles are another great bubble boost – shoot bubbles with a bomb and you’ll be popping bubbles in no time
🟠 Ice bubbles are a new strategic bubble that can be thawed when you shoot bubble match near them – if you have a lightning bubble or bomb bubble, you can shoot bubbles right through ice bubbles
🟠 Stone bubbles are an obstacle that will make all free bubble games a thought-provoking challenge
🟠 Precise bubble shooting action with spectacular touch controls
🟠 Countless levels for hours of bubble shooter fun
🟠 Wall bounce shots for difficult to reach bubbles

Fun facts about Bubble Shooter games:
🟢 The first bubble shooter game was released in 1994
🟢 Bubble shooter has been remade thousands of times, but this is the best version
🟢 Most bubble shooter games do not have powerup bubbles
🟢 The original bubble shooter game, Puzzle Bobble, was released as Bust a Move in the United States

How to play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter:
Bubble Shooter is perfect for new and experienced players alike. To play, simply use your finger to aim the bubble and shoot it at two or more bubbles of the same color to pop them! The goal of the game is to remove all bubbles on the board, but remember that you can drop bubbles by popping the bubbles above them; this is key to winning Arkadium's Bubble Shooter. As you play, you will also unlock powerup bubbles that allow you to clear bubbles more quickly.

How to win in Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter:
The best way to play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter is to play it like a strategy game. Even though it looks like a shooting game, aiming is much less important than planning out your next bubble shot. Before shooting bubbles, look at the level and plan your moves out ahead of time. If you see a lot of obstacles, it might be worth shooting bubble boosts to make a clear path. Alternatively, if you see a large cluster of bubbles, don’t go straight for the bubble pop! Instead, save the easiest shots for later and always conserve your bubble boosts like lightning and bomb bubbles. As you get to the harder levels, Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter becomes an even more tactical puzzle game. Also, wall shots are key.

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is the best version of bubble shooter on Android. Play now to unwind and pop your stress away with relaxing bubble shooter games

Download and play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter today!

Play more free game apps: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7031012817479113798&hl=en_US&gl=US

Play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter online: https://www.arkadium.com/games/bubble-shooter/

Play more free classic games at Arkadium: www.arkadium.com

title: Bubble Shooter - Bubble Shooter Match 3 Bubble Pop

creator: Arkadium Games
descriptionHtml:
Play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter for FREE and use colorful powerups to blast beautiful bubbles! Try Lightning Bubbles and Bomb Bubbles to reach new levels and scores. Play it today for free!!!

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is the classic bubble shooter game you know and love. Match 3 bubbles of the same color and launch yourself into a balloon crushing mania. It may burst bubbles but this is one of the best color match bubble games of all time.

Play this free popular casual puzzle game anytime, anywhere. With Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter, you can even play offline with no wifi needed!

Aim, shoot, and pop bubbles in this cathartic action game. Arkadium's Bubble Shooter offers numerous levels and bubble powerups to keep you playing endless free bubble shooter games.

This free Bubble Shooter game is also known as Bubble Pop, Bubble Shooter Arena, Puzzle Bobble, or Bust a Move around the world. Whether you're a beginner or a professional, Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is easy to pick up but difficult to master. Fans of all ages love this modern, relaxing Bubble Shooter game!

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter delivers:
🟠 Gorgeous art, sound, and bubble popping animations
🟠 Lightning bubbles for clean bubble pop action – burst bubbles by the dozen with this powerup
🟠 Bomb bubbles are another great bubble boost – shoot bubbles with a bomb and you’ll be popping bubbles in no time
🟠 Ice bubbles are a new strategic bubble that can be thawed when you shoot bubble match near them – if you have a lightning bubble or bomb bubble, you can shoot bubbles right through ice bubbles
🟠 Stone bubbles are an obstacle that will make all free bubble games a thought-provoking challenge
🟠 Precise bubble shooting action with spectacular touch controls
🟠 Countless levels for hours of bubble shooter fun
🟠 Wall bounce shots for difficult to reach bubbles

Fun facts about Bubble Shooter games:
🟢 The first bubble shooter game was released in 1994
🟢 Bubble shooter has been remade thousands of times, but this is the best version
🟢 Most bubble shooter games do not have powerup bubbles
🟢 The original bubble shooter game, Puzzle Bobble, was released as Bust a Move in the United States

How to play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter:
Bubble Shooter is perfect for new and experienced players alike. To play, simply use your finger to aim the bubble and shoot it at two or more bubbles of the same color to pop them! The goal of the game is to remove all bubbles on the board, but remember that you can drop bubbles by popping the bubbles above them; this is key to winning Arkadium's Bubble Shooter. As you play, you will also unlock powerup bubbles that allow you to clear bubbles more quickly.

How to win in Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter:
The best way to play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter is to play it like a strategy game. Even though it looks like a shooting game, aiming is much less important than planning out your next bubble shot. Before shooting bubbles, look at the level and plan your moves out ahead of time. If you see a lot of obstacles, it might be worth shooting bubble boosts to make a clear path. Alternatively, if you see a large cluster of bubbles, don’t go straight for the bubble pop! Instead, save the easiest shots for later and always conserve your bubble boosts like lightning and bomb bubbles. As you get to the harder levels, Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter becomes an even more tactical puzzle game. Also, wall shots are key.

Arkadium's Bubble Shooter is the best version of bubble shooter on Android. Play now to unwind and pop your stress away with relaxing bubble shooter games

Download and play Arkadium’s Bubble Shooter today!

Play more free game apps: https://play.google.com/store/apps/dev?id=7031012817479113798&hl=en_US&gl=US

Play Arkadium's Bubble Shooter online: https://www.arkadium.com/games/bubble-shooter/

Play more free classic games at Arkadium: www.arkadium.com

Look at the level and plan your moves ahead of time. If you see a large cluster of bubbles, don’t go straight for the bubble pop! Save the easiest shots for later and conserve your bubble boosts like lightning and bomb bubbles. As you advance, it becomes a tactical puzzle game with cool, ice bubbles.
